text:
Sharing this everywhere- I'm super excited to show the full cover artwork painted for Sigil's Secret Menu!

🌟 The book is available on DMSGuild here: https://www.dmsguild.com/m/product/471432

#LGArt #ttrpg #art
Thank you Ash!! I was dissecting the character art from Hades so so much for this and I'm so glad I managed to replicate the vibe of it!
Thank you! ❤️

Wrathion but in Hades-like style ✨

#Art #LynArt #WorldofWarcraft
Calling upon the hive mind. I need some ideas for tag lines for Shadowheart and Gale! The other two were so damn easy but now I'm struggling!!

🦋
#art #horses #backlog
👹 durge 👹
That's a very cool durge! Love your brushwork so much once again, and making the eyes red fits so well for a durge char!!

Melancholy 🌷
---
Once in a blue moon I draw WoW stuff so here's a Wrathion piece I've had sitting in my files for like two years!

#Art #LynArt #WorldofWarcraft
This WIP looks so gorgeous!! Love the stylization you have going on on the characters!

Now that my Patreon is gone I think I'm gonna start sharing art like I used to before that
So let's go with my current WIP! 
I'm playing with styles here, painted background and line characters and props
I started this one like 5 or 6 months ago xD

Thank you so much Ash!! 😭😭 I really wanted to push myself on how I use various edges, focus on softer or lost ones more! And I just stared SO MUCH at that realistic 3D render from the Dragonflight artbook to pick up all the outfit details and figure out how to paint his face!
Thank you!
Gosh your brushwork is so gorgeous and those little hints of colder colors in the skintone here and there??? So good 😭😭

Enver #Gortash studies from last month, I might go ahead and post them on x later or insta(don’t really use it but whatever) but here first. I still find him kind of difficult to draw and paint and will practice more when I’m not sick 😷 now back to my millionth #bg3 run

Some close ups!

This thing was stuck in my files, fully finished, for so long because it's just so different from everything else I do but I loved painting it and I like how it looks, so I'm sharing it

Thank you Ash!! At this point I think I'm physically incapable of drawing a piece with Taelon where he doesn't look fancy 😂 I used a lot of drag queen outfits and makeup as inspiration for those too, they always have such cool looks!

Melancholy 🌷
---
Once in a blue moon I draw WoW stuff so here's a Wrathion piece I've had sitting in my files for like two years!

#Art #LynArt #WorldofWarcraft
Thank you!! I can't draw him without fancy jewelry and makeup 😂 I looked at so much makeup from drag queens and various singers for inspiration, drag queens especially have so many cool looks!
Thank you! I feel like I unintentionally make him even prettier every time I draw him 😂

One day I will stop having to repost my art to have working tags and the un-potatoed resolution... Bear with me please 😩

Think next week I'm just gonna put up some fanarts I've been sitting on because I considered them too frivolous to share out in the open but now I'm just tired

Will you eat of the forbidden fruit? 🍇 
--- 
My OC, Taelon. I just wanted to draw him in an uncharacteristic outfit color scheme 

#Art #LynArt #OriginalCharacter
Thank you!
I just adore the warm lighting and the way you used architecture as part of the composition!

Ghostfire Gaming - Elyrian Cabinet
AD: Matt DeMino

The second piece I did for Sebastian Crowe's Guide to Drakkenheim!

Oh I just love how perfectly you captured the Ghibli movie vibes in this, from the style of the shading on the characters, the grass and flowers, the stylization of the clothes... Even the soft and joyful vibes are in there! Beautifully done!!
Thank you!! I learnt so much about character design and painting architecture while working on it 😭😭
Thank you!! The 3D model I made really helped with the perspective and lighting for this! My brain would've melted if I tried to keep track of all the weird perspective things going on 😭

Ahhhh thank you! Detail levels are so tricky to get right, the line between too much noise and just enough info to not look generic is so thin 😩I'd love to do another piece to practice it and improve in weak areas 😭😭

Dorian and what could've been 🌹 

Made for a Critical Role fanart project by ExandriaArtists on twitter a while ago

#CriticalRole #CriticalRoleFanart #Art #LynArt
Thank you Ash!! I love warm pastels for backgrounds far too much 😭😭 And I'm really glad you like the lines, I so rarely dare to do them as sketchy as this!
It looks really fun in the illustration too, it really carries over! And gosh all the concepts I've seen from you were always so cool and thoughtful, I just love your prop/item concept work 😭

New pages of the last chapter of The Ocean Soul! We're stomping through the woods.

www.the-ocean-soul.com/comic/page-1...

More free reading links in replies ✨️

💧

Guess I thrive on overly dramatic tiefling/DnD art...

#Art #LynArt #dndCharacter

I have opened an online shop!! If you ever want one of my prints, grab 'em here... 🖌️🎨

👉 tshortik.bigcartel.com

A little flashback to Campaign 2! 🧊 

#CriticalRole #CriticalRoleFanart #Art #LynArt
Gosh I just love this piece, the warm colors and the joyful feeling of it, also the board and sail design too!
windsurfer

Heyo blue site #57! 

I make art and (sometimes) finish it! You've seen me as wwifihunters elsewhere where I lost the username game. 

I like horror, inflicting sad ocs on the rest of the world, and painting weird colors ✨
Look at her looking so majestic!! I adore the way you painted her clothes floating in the wind around her and the cool tones of the background that got her to really pop!

Keyleth of the Air Ashari.
Kiki has a special place in my heart. I've been meaning to go back and redo the original piece from 2019. Finally did the thing. Here she is in all her druidic glory.

#criticalrolefanart #criticalroleart #keyleth
I love the red/blue contrast going on to separate the character groups and how you arranged everything in a pyramidal shape, it's such a delicious composition!!

Under her gaze

Raven Queen themed piece I did for the Character Study zine 🖤
Gosh your linesssss and shadinggggg they're all so gorgeous!!! 😭😭

(bg3) 🔥
this is dedicated to tumblr user "buhloodweeeave" who gifted me the following fic:
archiveofourown.org/works/54044203
(explicit warnings for the fic/link)

I have some availability for commissions and commercial works in the next few months.

I do cover and interior art for TTRPGs and books, as well as character and prop pieces. :)

Reach out if you'd like to work with me!

📧 zoe.badini@gmail.com
🎨 zoebadini.carrd.co
I've been plotting and writing some small bits about my characters and all I have is, extremely out of context: the true forbidden candy

On one hand I want to really try to have a career in art because it would make me feel happy but on the other everything feels so bleak that maybe I should just give up on everything creative because at this rate that and happiness seem like they won't pay for anything

Happy Valentine's with this old Taelon and Emyr art! 💜

#Art #LynArt #OriginalCharacter

World building is so stupid, I'm having a time of my life thinking... Checks notes... How abudance of wood in the surrounding area makes it majority of buildings in the city are made out of it and only very wealthy have some stuff made out of stone
The marknaking in these is just so delicious
The art is absolutely gorgeous and the world building, plot and juicy intrigue are so compelling, get eeet!
The visible muscle fibers, eyes where they shouldn't be and then fur over all that is just so horrifying, love it. You paint all the different surfaces so well!!

Finally stopped sitting around and made an account here! Felt like a good time for a (re)introduction--I'm Gib / Innis, and I'm a concept artist and illustrator! Here's some of my favorite pieces I've done these past few years (-:

Hi there #PortfolioDay !! 

I'm Juno and I love to make fantasy art. Always looking for TTRPG work and  indie projects of all kinds.

Contact info & website in bio~
Thank you! I've really been thriving just drawing my own characters 😭😭

Since Bluesky is now open, hi, hello, I draw fantasy stuff and people in fancy outfits! There's some DnD and Critical Role art, but also a lot of OC art 💎

✨ All links & portfolio: lynaiss.carrd.co
✨ Art-only feed: bsky.app/profile/did:...

Bluesky is finally open! Hey hey!
I'm Olivia, an artist and I paint things :)
Some scene sketches! Now in better quality because it was annoying me.
Outfit designs for Taelon, the Prime Enchanter, and Emyr, the Songweaver ✨
Some Emyr sketches 🌷
Taelon sketches 💎
"Count Dracula"  🦇  acrylics on paper
I've been plotting for like 30 minutes and I already have a headache. Why does it have to be like an infernal puzzle 😩
Thank you!! :D

It was my birthday recently! I'd really appreciate if you'd share my art 💜

I draw fantasy with fancy characters and thrive on researching clothing. Currently I'm just trying to do more of my own stuff - last three images are all my characters!

My portfolio and all other links: lynaiss.carrd.co

Palestine is calling for a global strike from the 21st - 28th of January 2024.

Here's a helpful guide on what you can do to participate in the strike, with alt text. Even if you can't do it all, do the most that you can.

#StrikeForPalestine #FreePalestine #CeasefireNow
Thank you!
The drow harpist! Does it sing or does it sound like music?
Taelon sketches 💎
That leather texture and reflections are just so juicy!
That lighting is so gorgeous! I love the warm/cool combo you used to define shapes on the cello and the character!
The tiefling cellist!

Oh I just love all the different abominable and horrifying elements going on in there!! The multiple eyes where eyes shouldn't be, what looks like exposed muscle tissue on the legs, and the multi tongue tentacle situation... It's all so deliciously creepy!
I would love to share with you a bit of nightmare fuel I got to paint recently for Grim Hollow aberration board game. It's the Druid Gnoll and it's NOT friend shaped!
Some Emyr sketches 🌷

Some original stuff can still like appeal to people on there but at least for me it was always such a hit and miss. Though the archiving and tagging options on it are so good.

I really recommend to like flip through it and read it a bit before buying, some editions can be unbearably dry to read!

Tumblr is super niche and at this point I'm not sure how viable it is for original stuff

The one I'm reading is a prose version I got off project gutenberg! More traditional translations are just word soup for me. If you have a decent library near you I'm sure you could find something even better!
I'm so excited for you! Glowing and magic effects you paint are always so delicious and I'm really looking forward to seeing what you'll create!
The jewelry is inspired a lot by a piece from Tal'Dorei Reborn by @/greyopals on twt/IG
Thank you!
Thank you!!

Tumblr feels so dead for me but it's also the only place beside bsky where I can just drop my stuff and leave without the platform chucking my thing into the shadow dimension as punishment

And I've honestly started reading the actual book so I know what the heck is going on!

Repainted an old Gilmore piece ✨

#CriticalRole #CriticalRoleFanart

Algo garbage is just so annoying. Embarrassing that I have to bank on people I follow everywhere also posting on tumblr or on here so I actually see their stuff. And apparently Circe Saga is supposed to release on February 14th, there's a wiki!
I think a release date was put up somewhere for the next one but I didn't look yet. I don't use tiktok so it takes me a bit to find news for it
Thank you! And it's really good, I've really had a lot of fun listening to all the tracks!
Poseidon sketches inspired by Epic the Musical's Ocean Saga 🌊
Thank you very much! I look at way too much haute couture 😩
Thank you!
Outfit designs for Taelon, the Prime Enchanter, and Emyr, the Songweaver ✨
They don’t know what’s going on but they’re here to help (same) 🔮✨

Hey! I'm Elhyana and I paint stuff! Mostly Fantasy and sometimes Sci-Fi! But really Women in armor and with swords

I'm Eleonor, a freelance illustrator from Portugal, and I love to paint elegant characters looking grandiose and full of symbolism ✨

Some scene sketches! Now in better quality because it was annoying me.
Some work in progress illustrations I hope to finish one day XD

All of these are gorgeous but that first one is so intriguing with the lighting and the character's expression! Also still adore the lighting and the clothing on that last one, the texture of the fabric is so delicious
So, if I upload images on desktop they don't get compressed to hell... -long suffering sigh- do I have the energy to reupload all the art I posted
Just some aimless Taelon doodles. Drawing my OCs is really making me thrive ngl
Thank you! I've not had this much fun drawing in ages 😭😭

Thank you! I've had so much fun with angles and  composition. And I really don't get how every single thing I upload here gets compressed to oblivion 😩 There's a less potato version here lynaiss.tumblr.com/post/7383837... and on twitter where notes aren't just jpeg artifacts 😩😩

Thank you!! Now to get through the remaining 20 of them 😂😂 Any form of sequential art is fun but gosh is it a lot of work, mad respect for you for managing to do this over and over again and always have such a good flow in the comics
Why did this get compressed to hell 💀💀
Some storyboard adjacent sketches. I listened to the slug in my ear telling me to draw my OCs 😔

Welcome, 2024. 

Last year I moved to another country, to the coast. Where I live now, there are rainbow clouds on the sky sometimes. The world still has wonder in it. 

To a better, kinder, more peaceful, more just year.
You somehow perfectly captured how this kind of clouds look, vibrant but translucent 😭😭
The devil is whispering in my ear to loosely storyboard some of this 😬
Not me looking at my half finished drabbles about how two of my characters met and fell in love after just abandoning them for like half a year...
Christmas present for my Descent Into Avernus group that I DM for ❤️‍🔥
Warframe is really feeding me in this new quest with the fun character designs, dialogues that have no straight explanation and delicious jaded ex vibes

To be chosen by a god. 
What an honour. 
What a curse... 

Four brave adventurers for the lovely @@73502! 
Love, LOVE projects like this!!!
These are all so beautifully drawn, your style is do delicious

And with the aye eye garbage it feels even more pointless to try to stay relevant. I've mostly just been opening social media once in a while to scroll through art but haven't had the energy to engage
A giant wheel of parmesan is currently occupying the bed in his tower so I'd say that one at the moment
And that's how he gets you 😂😂 Anything for some tax evasion so he can hoard even more cheese in his tower
I wanted to make it an even worse pun but my brain was cheese when I made him 😂
I planned making him a shady robed figure that will 100% try to sell you suspicious cheese in a back alley but I couldn't resist a wild cobbled together and gaudy outfit
Thank you! I had fun designing the robes!
Thank you! I honestly almost didn't post this at all because I draw so rarely these days so keeping any social media alive is impossible 😂
Thank you!

My DnD character, a cheese obsessed wizard Emment Thaler 🧀

#art #LynArt #dndCharacter
It's just so tiring! And so much of the art jobs are taken over by aye eye too, a career in that field feels even more insecure now

Gosh I've not drawn anything in months. EverythingTM is just so exhausting and the energy to put whatever is in my head into a visual language that communicates it well to other people feels like a waste with plagiarism machine stealing stuff and soc media being a mess. I've barely even been online
Throwback to some bangers
Thank you!
Gosh the colors are just so delicious!!

Finally finished this drawing of my husband's Genasi Swashbuckler! It's been a very busy couple of weeks 😭 Was nice to have some drawing time. Our living room is still utter chaos but my PC is set up at least!

I have a Critical Role fanart only feed of my art now!

Still contemplating making one for silly garbage art and sharing that stuff too

Some beard designs because I just wanted to explore how long ones would look with jewelry 

#Art #LynArt #ConceptArt

I never got to work in game dev so this thread and the bit you added on tumblr is interesting to read and incredibly frustratingthat tech is the limitation! I love when you talk about tech, I enjoy learning more about how things work in the background and how folks work around and with that

Hiya, I'm opening 2-3 slots to work on during AUG/SEP! 

🔸 Any characters welcome!
🔸 Regular updates and check-ins
🔸 Full amount upfront via PP or Stripe

Act 1 is so long!! And then comes act 3 with a steel chair!! It feels like it's longer than the other two combined. I love the game but gosh if I do another playthrough it's gonna take me months to do it at a normal pace 💀

Probably more like 200 looking at non playthrough numbers but shhh don't tell anyone I can't play the game like a normal person and need to speedrun areas on new saves to see when things trigger or what other dialogue trees look like

I'm seeing glimpses of absolute mess on muskrat owned hellscape and hmmm time to go back to being consumed by BG3.... I have like 120 hours on it and I don't think I'm even close to the end of act 3 😭😭
I'm glad to hear that!! 😭

My contribution for the Winter Season of a Critical Role fanart project by ExandriaArtists on twitter, featuring Yondis the Winter Star + a scene from the Flotket Alps adventure ❄️️

#CriticalRole #CriticalRoleFanart #Art #LynArt
I love how you've painted the expression and the vivid colors really keep my eyes on the character while the background remains secondary because of the more muted color!
Thank you!
Ha, good point!
Thank you!

Why raise the dead for nefarious means, when you can have them do your gardening instead? 🌼

#art #LynArt #dndCharacter
Ahh hope you have a great time with the course!! And I imagine thats plenty of time to learn basics! I definitely recommend learning to pose models in daz and then dumping that into blender!

It's so so helpful for more complex scenes! Strange lighting too of you're like me and can't really take photo refs like that. I can't really point you to one tutorial that covers the basics, I'm weird so I failed my way through things until I learnt better
Gosh I'm still absolutely in love with that first piece!! The way you stylized shapes is just so delicious

Hello there, I've finally made it whoo 

(all thanks to @@2114 ✨)
The lighting is stunning and I adore the way you used brushwork to paint intricate architecture!
Tomik, Distinguished Advokist. I painted this 5 years ago, and it was (at the time) probably the strongest painting I had done on a technical level! Definitely felt like a milestone
I just adore the almost graphic approach you used for the value/lighting structure here, it creates such an interesting composition!
Thank you!! I learnt so much about making blender models of the architecture in this, that thing did some real heavy lifting 😔

And as an extra, a few designs for Dorian’s fancy masquerade ball outfit 💎

#CriticalRole #CriticalRoleFanart #Art #LynArt
I always feed Gale the really cursed things 😂😂 Item's spoopy things can potentially come around and bite me in the ass in the future? Noooope, Gale just got a new snack 😂

I really hope there's a way that we can turn off the grime, I know they added it to signal to players to go to camp to rest but I've been here for far too many hours, Larian 😂😂 And yeah clothing is so good!! Even a lot of starting armor is super nice looking!
Happy Baldur's Gate 3 Launch Day! So excited a Belgian game studio is getting some (well deserved) recognition!

Thank you! And I can't either! I'll spend so so much time playing that thing 😭😭 And I can't believe they added that you can change the color of tiefling's horns! I've wanted that since the start of early access 😭
Mkay, let's try this out. >_>

You can like have them filter things with specific words or emoji in the post so it's handy for organisation. Right now the one I set up just excludes replies and includes anything that has at least 1 image
Bear with me while I repost stuff with tags so I can eventually create more feeds 😭

Shaun Gilmore and Darius ✨ 
— 
Painted for The Tourist’s Guide to Tal’Dorei - Northwest project from ExandriaArtists on twitter. I missed drawing things from Critical Role so so much and this fan project made me so happy and excited 😭😭

#CriticalRole #CriticalRoleFanart #Art #LynArt
Thank you! And her design is so recognizable and specific, I really wanted to do it justice 😭😭

That's so lucky! I seriously can see myself spending so many hours on it and playing through it a few times. I already accumulate a ridiculous amount of hours during early access when we didn't even have the new area
I'm so excited to play it!! I literally cleared up nearly everything for the rest of August and told everyone that after the 3rd I do not exist because I know I won't be able to stop myself

And here I am struggling to use linework along with some painting without losing it completely 😂😂 It's such a tricky balance to find between rendering and lines still being there properly ffff 
I actually had some of your portraits up as inspiration for that for Gilmore and Darius piece!
Thank you! I can never resist them but I suffer every time I have to render them 💀💀
The colors and the hand gestures/poses are so juicy!!
The colors here are so gorgeous!!
Thank you!! I'm so weak for triangles in compositions 😭😭 I really would like to return to this way of approaching painting, I liked the more organic feel of it

A quick portrait I did for ArtFight featuring a character from zuzartii! I wish I could've done more pieces for the event but it's like July is cursed 

#art #LynArt #dndCharacter
I am here hello fellow art nerds
Gosh, your brushwork and shapes are always so gorgeous 😭😭

🔵 Quote post with your blue art! 🔵

Blue is probably the colour I use the most. ~

#LGArt #art
That landscape piece is so wonderfully gloomy and I love the character designs on the others!

Should definitely use blue more💙

🔹Quote this post with your blue art🔹
Thank you! And ahhh with a better comp so it can be put beside text seamlessly... I can absolutely see it 😭😭
That third piece still captivates me so much, I love the way you captured the emotion there so much!
Gosh I remember seeing this portrait ages ago and it's so stunning how you used the soft lighting and strong highlights from the jewelry in the composition!
I'm still in awe of your composition, lighting and rendering here. It really feels like a MTG card!
All of these are so precious 😭😭 I love your eldritch bleps so much
I so feel this! And I can't believe how much art I just never saw because of algorithm nonsense
Hello everyone, I’m excited to be over here! Can I interest you in some small weird cats?
The Vengeful Vampire
Thank you Clara!! 😭😭 I really feel like I've learnt a ton working on it!
It feels that way 😭😭 I keep finding other artists I've followed elsewhere here because of retweets

Hello #PortfolioDay! 
It's me, Robson, brazilian artist who loves fantasy.
Asdfghfd thank you Nikki!! 😭😭 I probably would've approached a lot of things differently now but it was definitely one of those pieces where something clicked in my head
Thank you!!
Thank you!
I think you really handled it well and I really love that little detail where the head and ear are ticked behind the potions, that really caught my eye!
Yeah mine is too! And I'll drag my moots here even if it takes me a year of scrounging up invite keys 😭😭
Being able to finally see everyone's art is making me feel so excited to create again 😭😭
I love them 😭😭 And I really like how you used the lighting to create a sense of unity between them and against the background!

[ What happens in the ingredients closet, stays in the ingredients closet... ] 

Some fun with my and my husband's characters, Vivaan (left) & Nico (right.)

Hi, I’m Kristina, a freelance illustrator based in Hamburg, Germany. My clients are mainly book & game publishers big & small, and museums. Currently available for new projects! http://kristinagehrmann.com

Limpide, a water genasi bard. Original D&D character commission.

intro post! i'm zmeess and i draw stuff—a lot of fanart, some original stuff, most of it is dependent on my d&d obsession and all of it is tender and fluffy (until it's not). active in the #criticalrole neck of the woods this past year! you will never in your life guess what my favorite color is

Hello y'all!

I'm Genel and I like conjuring emotive and evocative art.
I want to EAT this design, those pointy shoulder pads and a spoopy glove are just 👌👌👌
All of these are so good but gosh that second one and the calamity one are just nuts, the composition and lighting are just 👌👌
Your linework and color schemes are so stunning, and I love how you use lighting to bring out key elements in the composition
Gosh I just love how painterly your work is, and that second piece still captivates me with how well you captured the atmosphere it's SO GOOD
I'm glad you approve of my thirst pieces 😔😔
I really dig that on tieflings and characters with horns!! Just sprinkle in some dragon vibes in there... I'm so tempted to do more stuff like that 😭
That color scheme is so stunning! Love the red with that blueish/purpleish white!
All of your characters are just 👌👌👌

Sharing some more art~ 🎨
All OCs this time! I'm very passionate about my stories and characters and am trying to figure out how to communicate that better...

Time for a post to introduce myself here! I’m Dan, a freelance illustrator working in fantasy, sci-fi and imaginative realism. 

I’m interested in working on TTRPGs, card games and more! You can see my full portfolio and find all of my links here: www.danenglish.art

I've a my art-only feed, it's basically a media tab of my stuff until that hopefully gets added to here 🤞

https://bsky.app/profile/did:plc:zqp5a5bosy67po4rhb3kgeng/feed/aaaeruig7grge
I do have more stuff similar to this too :D Guess I should share the next few days 😂😂
Thank you! I'm so weak for there being several parts of them 😭😭

Hi, I'm Nikki and I paint with vibrant colours. I mostly do fantasy art (lots of dnd and CR fanart), plus lots and lots of animals!

Especially birds, I like birds.

Hello, Bluesky! I'm Laura, an Italian freelance artist living in Iceland. I love painting fantasy illustrations and characters for TTRPGs, card games, and book covers. 😊

Clients include Darrington Press, Metal Weave Games, The Onyx Path, and more!

Hi everyone! I'm here here! 😊 I’m MeKenzie, a lover of colors and lighting , fantasy , and science fiction . I like to paint digitally and with oil paints. Check out my portfolio here: https://artstation.com/dm7  #art

Hi Bluesky! I'm a freelance illustrator from Mexico City that loves painting fantasy art. Just trying to find a good place to share my art. Past clients include Critical Role, Darrington Press, Wizards of the Coast, Dimension 20 and Paramount +.

💼 Ailustrar.com
✉ Ilustrandole@gmail.com

Reintroductions! I'm a TTRPG game designer & editor—I've gotten to work on some awesome projects the last several years, as co-lead for #CriticalRole's Tal'Dorei Reborn, managing editor of MCDM's ARCADIA, and an editor on seven official #dnd books. These days I'm off on a mysterious new adventure! ✨
Oh yes!!! I doubt it'll stay like that tho 😩

“Follow me…”
A set of original characters Amun (mine) and Dursus (Mosskat’s)!
I really hope that gets added down the line! And media tab too, I know you can kinda do it by making a custom feed but an actual feature would be really nice
Gosh SAME, and it's so nice actually seeing people's posts too

Hello! I'm Vex and I hope this place is cool. I'm a freelance artist from Germany who loves fantasy and cronchy colors ✨🪐

☄️Portfolio: tshortik.com
⚡️Newsletter: tshortik.com/newsletter
💫All Links: tshortik.carrd.co

I draw stuff.
